RelatedSentence: BULLHEAD CITY - It could be a first for Arizona , said Cindy Frizelle , co-founder and president of Tri-State Military Moms , Inc .

The nonprofit organization will launch its Military Banner Recognition Program during a presentation and dedication ceremony at Tuesday 's Bullhead City Council meeting , held at 5:30 p.m. in the council chamber , 1255 Marina Blvd .
Frizelle said banners will be on display until the service member is no longer on active duty , and will be installed twice a year , around Memorial Day and Veteran 's Day .
Nominations are accepted ongoing , and sponsorship donations to defray any cost to the nominating family are gratefully accepted , she said .

A1: Banners will be available for viewing in
RelatedSentence: Banners will be available for viewing in the courtyard next to the council chamber after Tuesday 's ceremony , Frizelle said .
